description: Manage intelligent packs for log analytics workspace.

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace pack disable
commands.summary: Disable an intelligence pack for a given workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace pack disable --intelligence-pack-name
                                                --resource-group
                                                --workspace-name
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace pack disable --name MyIntelligencePack --resource-group MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace pack enable
commands.summary: Enable an intelligence pack for a given workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace pack enable --intelligence-pack-name
                                               --resource-group
                                               --workspace-name
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace pack enable --name MyIntelligencePack --resource-group MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace pack list
commands.summary: List all the intelligence packs possible and whether they are enabled or disabled for a given workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace pack list --resource-group
                                             --workspace-name
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace pack list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace
